rmImgFringe¶

gempy.instruments.gmosTools.rmImgFringe(inimage, fringe, fl_statscale=False, statsec='', scale=0.0, logName=None, logLevel=1)[source]¶

Scale and subtract a fringe frame from GMOS gireduced image.

Parameters:
  • inimage (AstroData instance) – Input image
  • fringe (AstroData instance) – Fringe Frame
  • fl_statscale (Boolean) – Scale by statistics rather than exposure time
  • statsec (string of format ‘[EXTNAME,EXTVER][x1:x2,y1:y2]’) – image section used to determine the scale factor if fl_statsec=True
  • scale (real) – Override auto-scaling if not 0.0
  • logName (String, None causes default to be used., None causes default to be used.) – Name of the log file, default is ‘gemini.log’
  • logLevel (integer from 0-6, 0=nothing to screen, 6=everything to screen. OR the message level as a string (ie. ‘critical’, ‘status’, ‘fullinfo’...)) – Verbosity setting for the log messages to screen, default is ‘critical’ messages only. Note: independent of logLevel setting, all messages always go to the logfile if noLogFile=False.
Default statsec:
 

If CCDSUM = ‘1 1’ :[SCI,2][100:1900,100:4500]’ If CCDSUM = ‘2 2’ : [SCI,2][100:950,100:2250]’
